original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the reasoning?

original: rigs pa ni thar pa'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa ni thar pa'i rigs pa'o //
translated: It is the reasoning of liberation.

original: de la tshul gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la tshul gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the method?

original: sred pa rab tu spangs pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa rab tu spangs pa'o //
translated: It is the complete abandonment of craving.

original: de la sgo gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la sgo gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the gateway?

original: nyes pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa spangs pa'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of faults.

original: de la lam gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la lam gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the path?

original: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par shes pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of impermanence, suffering, emptiness, and no-self.🔽What is the level?

original: de la sa gang zhe na; 'di lta ste; smon pa med pa'i sa bcu'o //
analyzed: de la sa gang zhe na; 'di lta ste; smon pa med pa'i sa bcu'o //
translated: It is the ten levels of the aspirationless.

original: de la skye ba dang bral ba gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la skye ba dang bral ba gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the absence of birth?

original: skye ba bcad pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba bcad pa'o //
translated: It is the cutting of birth.

original: de la ye shes kyi sa gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la ye shes kyi sa gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the level of wisdom?

original: rmongs @263b pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs @263b pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of delusion.

original: de la mi shes pa spangs pa gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la mi shes pa spangs pa gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the abandonment of ignorance?

original: gti mug spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug spangs pa'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of delusion.

original: de la ye shes gnas pa gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la ye shes gnas pa gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the abode of wisdom?

original: mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of abode.

original: de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the level of the practice of yoga?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the absence of conceptualization.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams sgom pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams sgom pa'o //
translated: It is the cultivation of the thirty-seven factors of awakening.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattvas’ domain?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: It is the six perfections.

original: de la skyes bu dam pa dang bsten pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skyes bu dam pa dang bsten pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is attending to holy beings?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sangs rgyas la brten pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la brten pa'o //
translated: It is attending to the Buddha.

original: de la skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa spangs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa spangs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is avoiding unholy beings?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: mu stegs can dmigs par lta ba rnams rnam par spong ba'o //
analyzed: mu stegs can dmigs par lta ba rnams rnam par spong ba'o //
translated: It is avoiding tīrthikas who have views of objective reality.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the teaching of the Tathāgata?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sangs rgyas kyi stobs la gnas pa nas rang bzhin shes pas thar pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi stobs la gnas pa nas rang bzhin shes pas thar pa'o //
translated: It is liberation through the knowledge of the nature of things, having attained the powers of the Buddha.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi sa la gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi sa la gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the level of the Buddha?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: dge ba'i chos thams cad thob pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos thams cad thob pa'o //
translated: It is the attainment of all virtuous qualities.

original: de la mkhas pas rjes su yi rang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mkhas pas rjes su yi rang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the wise one’s rejoicing?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos dag gis rjes su yi rang ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos dag gis rjes su yi rang ba'o //
translated: It is the rejoicing of the buddhas, the blessed ones, of the past, present, and future, and of the śrāvakas.

original: de la byis pa dag gis spangs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byis pa dag gis spangs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is that which is rejected by the childish?

original: 'di lta ste; byis pa thams cad kyis rig par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste; byis pa thams cad kyis rig par dka' ba'o //
translated: It is that which is difficult for all the childish to know.

original: de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par dka' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par dka' ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is that which is difficult for the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas to know?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam @264a *//
analyzed: 'di lta ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam @264a *//
translated: It is this:

original: gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: the inconceivable qualities of the Buddha.

original: de la mu stegs can gyi sa ma yin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mu stegs can gyi sa ma yin pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is that which is not the level of the tīrthikas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: rnal 'byor pa dag gi log pa'i nga rgyal lo //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa dag gi log pa'i nga rgyal lo //
translated: the pride of the yogis.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis yongs su bzung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis yongs su bzung ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is that which is adopted by the bodhisattvas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: rnyed par dka' ba dang / rtsi chen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed par dka' ba dang / rtsi chen por gyur pa'o //
translated: that which is difficult to obtain and is of great value.

original: de la stobs bcu dag gis khong du chud pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stobs bcu dag gis khong du chud pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is that which is understood by those with the ten powers?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: dka' ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: dka' ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: the method of difficulty.

original: de la lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the homage of the gods?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: bde ba thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the attainment of all happiness.

original: de la tshangs pa dag gis phyag bye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshangs pa dag gis phyag bye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the homage of the Brahmins?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: thar pa thams cad thob par byed pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: thar pa thams cad thob par byed pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: the attainment of all liberation.

original: de la klu rnams kyis phyag bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la klu rnams kyis phyag bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the homage of the nagas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: bag chags thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the cutting off of all propensities.

original: de la gnod sbyin dag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnod sbyin dag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the rejoicing of the yakshas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the cutting off of all the paths to the lower realms.

original: de la mi'am ci dag gis phyag bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi'am ci dag gis phyag bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the homage of the kinnaras?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: thar ba'i rab tu bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thar ba'i rab tu bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the attainment of all the happiness of liberation.

original: de la lto 'phye chen po dag gis rab tu bsngags pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lto 'phye chen po dag gis rab tu bsngags pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the praise of the mahoragas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: 'khor ba gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the cutting off of samsara.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis bsgom par bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis bsgom par bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cultivation of the bodhisattvas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to attain omniscient wisdom.

original: de @264b la mkhas pa dag gis kun chub par bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de @264b la mkhas pa dag gis kun chub par bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the understanding of the wise?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to attain the stage of nonregression.

original: de la nor bla na med pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nor bla na med pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the supreme wealth?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: lha dang mi'i skye dgu phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed pa dang / thar pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i skye dgu phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed pa dang / thar pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to attain the perfection of the human and divine conditions and to attain liberation.

original: de la sbyin pa zang zing med pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sbyin pa zang zing med pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the generosity without material things?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to cut through all the afflictions.

original: de lan pa rnams kyi rtsi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de lan pa rnams kyi rtsi gang zhe na /
translated: What is the medicine for those who are sick?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to pacify desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: de la mdzod shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mdzod shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of the treasury?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the practice of the Dharma.

original: de la spobs pa mi zad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la spobs pa mi zad pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is inexhaustible eloquence?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: knowing and seeing things as they are.🔽“What is being free of sorrow?

original: de la mya ngan dang bral ba gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la mya ngan dang bral ba gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: It is🔽understanding that harm and suffering are meaningless, and knowing that

original: gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal don med par rtogs shing 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal bdag med par shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal don med par rtogs shing 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal bdag med par shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: suffering is without a self.

original: de la khams gsum yongs su shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams gsum yongs su shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of the three realms?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa'o //
translated: understanding that they are like an illusion or a dream.

original: de la pha rol tu 'gro ba dag gi gzings gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la pha rol tu 'gro ba dag gi gzings gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the boat for those who want to cross over to the other shore?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is🔽the desire to attain nirvāṇa with a superior motivation, and the meditation

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa dag mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa nyid du sgom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa dag mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa nyid du sgom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: on impermanence, suffering, and emptiness.

original: de la chu bo'i nang du song ba dag gi gru gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chu bo'i nang du song ba dag gi gru gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the raft for those who have entered the river?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: mya ngan las 'da' @265a *//
analyzed: mya ngan las 'da' @265a *//
translated: nirvāṇa🔽

original: ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it causes the attainment of nirvāṇa.

original: de la snyan pa 'dod pa dag gi grags pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snyan pa 'dod pa dag gi grags pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the fame of those who desire fame?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chos rgya chen po thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rgya chen po thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it causes the attainment of the vast Dharma.

original: de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the praise of the buddhas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rtsi'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rtsi'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the lord of the medicine of infinite qualities.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snyan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snyan pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the fame of the tathāgatas?🔽It is like this:

original: 'di lta ste; yon tan dang / bde ba thams cad dang / thar pa'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste; yon tan dang / bde ba thams cad dang / thar pa'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the lord of the gift of all qualities, happiness, and liberation.

original: de la stobs bcu dag gis bstod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stobs bcu dag gis bstod pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the praise of the ten powers?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chos rin po che rnyed par dka' ba'i sbyin pa dag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rin po che rnyed par dka' ba'i sbyin pa dag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the gift of the jewels of the Dharma that are difficult to obtain.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the quality of the bodhisattvas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chos 'di la bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos 'di la bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the training in this Dharma.

original: de la snying rje can dag gi btang snyoms gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snying rje can dag gi btang snyoms gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the equanimity of the compassionate?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the work of the Buddha has been done.

original: de la byams pas zhe sdang zhi ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byams pas zhe sdang zhi ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the pacification of anger through love?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the antidote.

original: de la theg pa chen po pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la theg pa chen po pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the relief of those who follow the Great Vehicle?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all aspirations for the Dharma of the Buddha are fulfilled.

original: de la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dag gi nan tan gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dag gi nan tan gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the practice of those who roar the lion’s roar?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: chos kyi mchog dang / chos kyi dam pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi mchog dang / chos kyi dam pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they attain the supreme Dharma and the holy Dharma.🔽“What is the path of the wisdom of the Buddha?

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gang @265b zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gang @265b zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: dge ba'i chos thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it causes the attainment of all good qualities.

original: de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the seal of all Dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: pha rol nas tshu rol rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha rol nas tshu rol rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the understanding of the other shore.

original: de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi 'phrogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi 'phrogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the invincible knowledge of omniscience?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa dang / thar pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa dang / thar pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the abandonment of all nonvirtuous qualities, the accomplishment of all virtuous qualities, and the accomplishment of all liberations.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the pleasure grove of the bodhisattvas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: bdag gi bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba thams cad kyis sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag gi bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba thams cad kyis sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the accomplishment of the happiness, joy, and delight of all beings through one’s own happiness, joy, and delight.

original: de la bdud kyi sde rnams 'jig par byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bdud kyi sde rnams 'jig par byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the destruction of the armies of the māras?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: stobs thams cad yongs su sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs thams cad yongs su sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the accomplishment of all strengths and the pacification of all afflictions.

original: de la bde bar 'gro ba'i rig pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bde bar 'gro ba'i rig pa gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: gtse ba thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gtse ba thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'o //

original: de la don grub pa rnams kyi don gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la don grub pa rnams kyi don gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'di lta ste; phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la dgra'i nang du song ba'i skyabs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dgra'i nang du song ba'i skyabs gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: dmigs pa can thams cad dang / log par lta pa rnams pham par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de la chos dang ldan pas mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod pa gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: chos dang ldan pas mu stegs can tshar @266a *//

analyzed: gcod pa'o // de la mi 'jigs pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su brtags pa dang / phyir brtags pa bzod pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de la stobs rnams yang dag par btsal ba gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: ma log pa'i tshul gyis so //

analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi snga ltas gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dkar po'i chos thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la rgyan gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyan gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the ornament?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de la thar par 'dod pa dag gi dga' ba gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: thog ma dang / dbus dang / tha mar dge ba'i phyir ro //

original: de la bu'i thu bo dag gi dga' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bu'i thu bo dag gi dga' ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the joy of the eldest sons?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: pha'i nor sangs rgyas kyi nor myong ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha'i nor sangs rgyas kyi nor myong ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the attainment of the experience of the wealth of the Buddha, the wealth of the father.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rdzogs pa gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rdzogs pa gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: “What is the completion of the wisdom of the Buddha?🔽It is

original: dkar po'i chos thams cad rjes su srung ba dang / dkar po'i chos thams cad gzhan ma yin par gso ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dkar po'i chos thams cad rjes su srung ba dang / dkar po'i chos thams cad gzhan ma yin par gso ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the stage that is not that of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rgya chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la sems can rnam par dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems can rnam par dag pa gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: dri ma @266b thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dri ma @266b thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the elimination of all impurities.

original: de la lus yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lus yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the elimination of all sickness.

original: de la rnam par thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the accomplishment of those who desire liberation?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi bar so sor rtog pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la 'dod chags kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dod chags kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the absence of defilement by desire?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: mi 'chi ba'i gnas yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'chi ba'i gnas yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the attainment of immortality.

original: de la zhe sdang dang bral ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zhe sdang dang bral ba gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: byams pa chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the attainment of great love.

original: de la gti mug gi sa ma yin pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gti mug gi sa ma yin pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is being free of the level of ignorance?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: chos yang dag pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos yang dag pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the attainment of the true nature of phenomena.

original: de la ye shes 'byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ye shes 'byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the arising of wisdom?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa shes pa thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa shes pa thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the generation of all knowledge of worldly and transcendent matters.

original: de la rig pa skye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rig pa skye ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the arising of knowledge?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: de lam rig pa spong ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de lam rig pa spong ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the abandonment of the path of knowledge?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

original: de la rnam par grol ba'i snying pos ngoms pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba'i snying pos ngoms pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the satisfaction of the essence of liberation?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: 'phags pa'i che ba nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i che ba nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la ting nge 'dzin snying por byed pa dag gi mthu gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin snying por byed pa dag gi mthu gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the power of those who make samādhi their essence?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽bde ba @267a *//
analyzed: 'di lta ste / bde ba @267a *//
translated: It is as follows:🔽It is in order to accomplish happiness,

original: dang dga' ba'i bde ba thams cad dang / sems rtse gcig pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang dga' ba'i bde ba thams cad dang / sems rtse gcig pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the happiness of joy, and mental one-pointedness.

original: de la mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyi mig gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyi mig gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the eye of those who wish to see?🔽It is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste bdag nyid lta ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste bdag nyid lta ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to see oneself.

original: de la rnam par 'phrul bar 'dod pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par 'phrul bar 'dod pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the supernormal knowledge of those who wish to manifest miracles?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sgrib pa med pa dang / 'dod par 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa dang / 'dod par 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to have unobstructed and desirable qualities.

original: de la mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the supernormal knowledge of those who wish to accomplish?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chos thams cad la mi rtog pa'i shes pa sgrib pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mi rtog pa'i shes pa sgrib pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to have unobstructed knowledge of all phenomena.

original: de la thos par 'dod pa rnams kyi gzungs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thos par 'dod pa rnams kyi gzungs gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the dhāraṇī of those who wish to hear?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all phenomena are the same as nirvāṇa.

original: de la dran pa mi nyams pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa mi nyams pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the absence of mental decline?

original: 'di lta ste //
analyzed: 'di lta ste //
translated: It is as follows:

original: mya ngan las 'das par dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reference to nirvāṇa is naturally peaceful.

original: de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the blessing of the buddhas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: mtha' yas pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it accomplishes the infinite.

original: de la mgon po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mgon po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the skillful method of the protectors?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: thams cad bde ba dang legs par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad bde ba dang legs par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it leads to the happiness and well-being of all.

original: de la phra mo gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phra mo gang zhe na /
translated: “What is subtlety?🔽It is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste; mya ngan las 'das pa la dmigs pa rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste; mya ngan las 'das pa la dmigs pa rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reference to nirvāṇa is peace.

original: de la shes par dka' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la shes par dka' ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is difficulty in understanding?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: so sor rig par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor rig par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is difficult to know.

original: de la @267b mi brtson pa rnams kyis rig par dka' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la @267b mi brtson pa rnams kyis rig par dka' ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the difficulty in understanding of those who are not diligent?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sngon ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has not been heard before.

original: de la yi ge rnams ldog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yi ge rnams ldog pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the reversal of the letters?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: tshig gi lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig gi lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all verbal expressions are non-apprehensible.

original: de la sgras shes par dka' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sgras shes par dka' ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the difficulty of understanding through sound?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all phenomena are inconceivable.

original: de la mkhas pa dag gis yongs su shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mkhas pa dag gis yongs su shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the understanding of the wise?🔽It is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste; rin po che don che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste; rin po che don che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the great value of the jewels.

original: de la des pa dag gis shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la des pa dag gis shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of the modest?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: bkur sti kun shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bkur sti kun shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the knowledge of respect.

original: de la 'dod pa nyung bas rtogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa nyung bas rtogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the realization of those with few desires?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: bkur sti mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bkur sti mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the absence of pride.

original: de la brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis gzung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis gzung ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the retention of those who have begun to make an effort?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of not abandoning one’s efforts.

original: de la dran pa can gyis bcangs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa can gyis bcangs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the retention of those who are mindful?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: byas pa chud mi za bar phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa chud mi za bar phyir ro //
translated: It is the non-wastage of action.

original: de la sdug bsngal zad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal zad pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the end of suffering?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the abandonment of desire, hatred, and ignorance.

original: de la chos mi skye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos mi skye ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the non-arising of phenomena?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the cessation of all consciousness.

original: de la bstan pa gcig gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bstan pa gcig gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the single teaching?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is

original: srid pa'i 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes chos thams cad mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes chos thams cad mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the non-arising of all phenomena, as in the statement, ‘All phenomena are like a dream. ’

original: 'di ni tshig gsum brgya po 'di rnams dag @268a *//
analyzed: 'di ni tshig gsum brgya po 'di rnams dag @268a *//
translated: “Young man, this is the purification of the three words.

original: par bstan par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: par bstan par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be known to be

original: gzhon nu / 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu / 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
translated: the samādhi, the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena.🔽“Young man, you should train by thinking, ‘I will attain the samādhi, the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena.’

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
translated: Then the Bhagavān spoke these verses:

original: sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste //
translated: “The Buddha’s Dharma is vast,

original: tshul yang rgya cher bstan pa yin //
analyzed: tshul yang rgya cher bstan pa yin //
translated: And the way is also taught extensively.

original: chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na //
analyzed: chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na //
translated: Because the Dharma is taught extensively,

original: yon tan rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain vast qualities.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba //
translated: Just as space is vast,

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin te //
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin te //
translated: The characteristics of phenomena are also like that.

original: rin chen 'od zer rgya chen gang //
analyzed: rin chen 'od zer rgya chen gang //
translated: The vast light of jewels

original: de phyir shin tu rgyas zhes bya //
analyzed: de phyir shin tu rgyas zhes bya //
translated: Is therefore called ‘vaipulya.’

original: sems can spyod pa rgya che ste //
analyzed: sems can spyod pa rgya che ste //
translated: The conduct of beings is vast,

original: de dag bstan pa'ang rgya che'o //
analyzed: de dag bstan pa'ang rgya che'o //
translated: And their teaching is also vast.

original: lung gi don yang rgya che bas //
analyzed: lung gi don yang rgya che bas //
translated: The meaning of the scriptures is also vast,

original: de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya //
analyzed: de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya //
translated: Therefore it is called ‘vaipulya.’

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na /
translated: When the Bhagavān explained this Dharma discourse that teaches the samādhi, the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena,

original: sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: Innumerable sentient beings gave rise to the mind set on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur ro //
translated: Innumerable sentient beings became irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa dag rang byang chub tu sems skyes so //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa dag rang byang chub tu sems skyes so //
translated: Innumerable sentient beings gave rise to the mind set on individual awakening.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba la sems skyes so //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba la sems skyes so //
translated: Innumerable sentient beings gave rise to the mind set on manifesting the result of an arhat.🔽This great billionfold world system shook in six ways:

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i @268b 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g-yos /🔽rab tu g-yos /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i @268b 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g-yos / rab tu g-yos /
translated: it shook, shook strongly, and shook intensely;

original: kun tu rab tu g-yos /🔽'gul / rab tu 'gul /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu g-yos / 'gul / rab tu 'gul /
translated: it quivered, quivered strongly, and quivered intensely;

original: kun tu rab tu 'gul /🔽ldeg / rab tu ldeg /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'gul / ldeg / rab tu ldeg /
translated: it trembled, trembled strongly, and trembled intensely;🔽it quaked, quaked strongly, and quaked intensely;

original: kun tu rab tu ldeg ;'khrugs /🔽rab tu 'khrugs /🔽kun tu rab tu 'khrugs /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu ldeg ;'khrugs / rab tu 'khrugs / kun tu rab tu 'khrugs /
translated: it shuddered, shuddered strongly, and shuddered intensely;🔽it rocked, rocked strongly, and rocked intensely;🔽it reeled, reeled strongly, and reeled intensely;

original: chem chem / rab tu chem chem /🔽kun tu rab tu chem chem /
analyzed: chem chem / rab tu chem chem / kun tu rab tu chem chem /
translated: it swayed, swayed strongly, and swayed intensely;

original: 'ur 'ur / rab tu 'ur 'ur /
analyzed: 'ur 'ur / rab tu 'ur 'ur /
translated: it roared, roared strongly, and roared intensely;🔽it rumbled, rumbled strongly, and rumbled intensely;🔽it boomed, boomed strongly, and boomed intensely.

original: kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur; shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur; shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho /
translated: The east sank and the west rose,

original: nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho /🔽byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho /
analyzed: nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho / byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho /
translated: the west sank and the east rose,🔽the north sank and the south rose,

original: lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho /🔽mtha' dma' na dbus mtho /
analyzed: lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho / mtha' dma' na dbus mtho /
translated: the south sank and the north rose,🔽the periphery sank and the center rose,

original: dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste /
analyzed: dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste /
translated: and the center sank and the periphery rose.

original: 'jig rten du snang ba dpag tu med pa dag byung bar gyur to //🔽lha'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten du snang ba dpag tu med pa dag byung bar gyur to // lha'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab bo //
translated: Innumerable lights appeared in the world.🔽A great rain of divine incense fell.

original: lha dag kyang me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so //
analyzed: lha dag kyang me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so //
translated: The gods also caused a great rain of flowers to fall.

original: lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang steng gi bar snang la rdung ngo //
analyzed: lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang steng gi bar snang la rdung ngo //
translated: Hundreds of thousands of divine musical instruments were played in the sky above.

original: lha'i na bza' dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la g-yogs shing tshig 'di skad ces zer ro //
analyzed: lha'i na bza' dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la g-yogs shing tshig 'di skad ces zer ro //
translated: Divine garments were draped in the sky above, and this sound was heard:

original: gang gis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin te /
translated: “Those beings who will hear this Dharma discourse called ‘Introduction to the Great Compassion’ will be most fortunate.

original: sems can de dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can de dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those beings will have served many buddhas.

original: gang gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par 'gyur @269a *//
analyzed: gang gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par 'gyur @269a *//
translated: Those who hear this absorption, the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena,

original: zhing thos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom pa dang / mang du byed pa dang /
analyzed: zhing thos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom pa dang / mang du byed pa dang /
translated: and, having heard it, write it out, hold it, keep it, read it, master it, cultivate it in meditation without conceptualization, practice it extensively,

original: gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: and teach it extensively to others will become worthy of the offerings of all beings.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Ānanda,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zungs shig /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zungs shig /
translated: you should hold this Dharma discourse,

original: lhogs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /
analyzed: lhogs shig / kun chub par gyis shig /
translated: recite it, and master it.”

original: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /
analyzed: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /
translated: You should also teach it extensively to others.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Ānanda said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
translated: what is the name of this Dharma discourse?

original: ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
translated: How should I remember it?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: mdo sde 'di snying rje chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di snying rje chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
translated: remember this sūtra as The Entry into Great Compassion.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: Also remember it as The Samādhi, the Equal Nature of All Phenomena, Elaborated in Detail.

original: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
analyzed: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
translated: ” Ānanda said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags so //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags so //
translated: I have remembered this Dharma discourse.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'khor bzhi po dge slong @269b dang; dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'khor bzhi po dge slong @269b dang; dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /
translated: the venerable Ānanda, and the fourfold assembly of bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, and upāsikās,

original: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
translated: and the many gods of the Śuddhāvāsa class, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: rejoiced and praised the Bhagavān’s words.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa rdzogs so ////
translated: This concludes the samādhi, the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dharm'a t'a sh'i las bsgyur cing zhus te /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dharm'a t'a sh'i las bsgyur cing zhus te /
translated: It was translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptor Śīlendrabodhi and the chief editor and translator Bandé Dharmatāśīla.

original: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
analyzed: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
translated: It was also corrected according to the new terminology.
